ygData.subject: Re: Kill Steal (was - Wizards being resisted)
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe that the kill steal trick she s referring to is the enchanter mesmerizing a creature, and then nuking, and getting the kill as if the original
ygData.messageBody:
i believe that the kill steal trick she's referring to is the enchanter
mesmerizing a creature, and then nuking, and getting the kill as if the
original assailants had zoned it. i have a friend that just started an
enchanter, and was talking about helping twink it, and he mentioned that
tactic. LJ is level 25, however, and i'm not sure if mesmerize would
work on it..nor do i know if memory blur or another hate list erase
spell would do the same thing. anyhow, don't play an enchanter, so i
could be wrong.

--
[ Timothy Whitman ] [ uin: 6508449 ] [ timothy@... ]
[ "Pessimism is the only practical, realistic way to look at life" ]
